triples.name: Contrastive Hebbian learning
triples.relevance: The foundational concept of contrastive learning that the paper reviews, tracing origins back to the 1990s.

triples.name: Self-supervised learning
triples.relevance: Core application domain where contrastive learning has achieved recent success in representation learning.

triples.name: Similarity learning
triples.relevance: Metric learning is explicitly mentioned as a field where contrastive learning development spans across.

triples.name: Feature learning
triples.relevance: Representation learning is the core concept underlying contrastive learning methods reviewed in this framework.

triples.name: Computer vision
triples.relevance: Primary application domain where contrastive learning has recently received significant interest and success.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Field where contrastive learning development has spanned and where it is applied, as discussed in the paper.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning domain where the paper demonstrates application examples of contrastive learning methods.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Broader field encompassing the contrastive learning methods that the paper analyzes through different machine learning sub-field views.
